item.title: Letâ€™s make a simple todo app with Go
item.description: Build a simple Todo app with Go! This guide walks you through creating a basic CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) application using Go, where youâ€™ll manage a list of tasks with a simple API and store data in database.
